meanings.sent1: She bellyached about having to do her chores.
meanings.sent2: He always bellyached about the long lines at the grocery store.
meanings.sent3: The child bellyached about having to eat his vegetables.
meanings.sent4: Despite his success, he continued to bellyache about minor inconveniences.
meanings.sent5: Her constant bellyaching made everyone around her feel tired.

meanings.definition: Suffered from a stomachache or discomfort in the abdomen
meanings.sent1: After eating too much candy, he bellyached all night.
meanings.sent2: She bellyached after trying the spicy curry for the first time.
meanings.sent3: The boy bellyached loudly after accidentally swallowing a cherry pit.
meanings.sent4: His bellyaching was so intense that he had to visit the doctor.
meanings.sent5: The poor cat bellyached after eating a piece of rotten fish.
